title: BRIEF-Mirasol Resources Announces Non-Brokered Private Placement Of Up 2.5 Mln Units At $2 Per Unit
text:
May 2 (Reuters) - Mirasol Resources Ltd:
* PRIVATE PLACEMENT FINANCING * MIRASOL RESOURCES - NON-BROKERED PRIVATE PLACEMENT OF UP 2.5 MILLION UNITS AT $2.00 PER UNIT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
